faq-1.question: What is the Hospital Engineering Forum?
faq-1.answer: The Hospital Engineering Forum will be the first virtual national forum and international fair by the Indonesian Association of Hospital Engineering (IAHE). This forum focuses on 6 hospital engineering areas: Hospital Building, Hospital Mechanic, Hospital Electric, Hospital Environment, Hospital Informatics, and Hospital Devices. More than 40 speakers from government, association, hospital and industries are invited. We also provide around 100 local and international exhibitors. This event will be co-organised with Karya Indonesia Cerdas

faq-2.question: Who is participating at the Hospital Engineering Forum 2022?
faq-2.answer: The event is open to the public. However, we will invite around 10000 members of IAHE and 3000 hospitals which will consist of people from the healthcare settings such as hospital management staff, hospital clinical staff, hospital engineering staff, biomedical engineer, medical doctor, government staff and university lecturers.

faq-3.question: Who is the organizer of this event?

answer.1: The organizer of this event is the Indonesian Association of Hospital Engineering (IAHE) in partnership with PT. Karya Indonesia Cerdas (KIC).
answer.2: The Indonesian Association of Hospital Engineering (IAHE) is a professional organization of technical experts and corporations engaged in the construction, operation, and maintenance of hospitals in Indonesia. The association was established on October 3, 2019 in Jakarta, and was ratified by the Ministry of Law and Human Rights with the number AHU-0011147.AH.01.07. The organization vision is to become the leading organization that encourages the realization of hospitals in Indonesia that are Safe, environMentally friendly, Affordable, secuRe, and worThwhile (SMART).
answer.3: PT. Karya Indonesia Cerdas is a partner company of IAHE since 2019 and has been collaborating with IAHE in organizing several seminars and workshops over the past year with a total of around 10000 participants ranging from medical, engineering and management staff of the hospitals.

faq-5.answer: If you have any further questions, we will be happy to assist you through our email at hospital.engineering.expo@gmail.com or you could visit the contact us page to get other means of contact details.

faq-1.question: I want to attend FTP 2022. How do I register?

faq-2.question: Is there a fee to participate in HEF 2022?
faq-2.answer: There are no visitor participation fees at our events! You can share this good news to your friends who may also be interested in joining this event!

faq-3.question: What can I do in this event?

answer.1: In HEF 2022, you are be able to:
answer.2: Watching seminars and participating in lectures Live Q&A with the speakers
answer.3: See various products at the Virtual Exhibition from various Industries in the field of Hospital Engineering and build your relationship with Industry representatives

faq-4.question: What benefits do I get when I attend HEF 2022?
faq-4.answer: To see the benefits of attending HEF 2022, please visit 'Why Attend?' page under the visitor menu or click the link below register

faq-5.question: Can I speak with the exhibitor directly/live, inside the exhibition stand?
faq-5.answer: You can communicate with exhibitors in a number of ways. One of the way is by sending a message via live chat and leaving a question about their product or service, then a booth representative will reply as soon as possible.

faq-6.question: How do I ask a question about a product I see?
faq-6.answer: If you are interested in the company's products, you can ask questions in the live chat, then you can also take part in the Product Simulation session which is available in several Hospital topics, where in this session there will be a Q&A about related products.

faq-1.question: I am interested in sponsoring this event, who should I contact?
faq-1.answer: If you are interested in sponsoring this event and you would like to contact the person in charge, please email us at hospital.engineering.expo@gmail.com or whatsapp us at +62 858 9377 7283 (Adrian). We will contact you as soon as possible.

faq-2.question: What are the benefits of being a sponsor in HEF 2022?

faq-3.question: How do I register my company as one of the exhibitors?
faq-3.answer: If you wish to register as an exhibitor, please open the Register as Exhibitor page under the registration menu or click the link below

faq-4.question: Is there a price list for the exhibition stand?
faq-4.answer: If you are interested in opening an exhibition stand and would like to know a price list, you can email us at hospital.engineering.expo@gmail.com or whatsapp us at +62 858 9377 7283 (Adrian) or visit our contact page. We will contact you as soon as possible.

faq-5.question: How long will my stand last?
faq-5.answer: The exhibition stand has remained active 24/7 throughout the year since its launch, but live chats will only be held for three days on June 4, 11 and 18, 2022.

faq-6.question: What are the benefits of being an exhibitor in HEF 2022?
